title: JoJoD&D5E
description:
a module designed to make setting up a game using the JoJo 5e system easier for people, this module isn't the most advanced but it does get the job done. Currently this module includes
- A compendium full of all the jojo 5e that includes the classes and effects
- Custom Skills form the system
- two effects that calculate stand stats/ac and one that calculates Ini(not these will need to be added to you and your stands character sheet)

Some things to be aware of, 
- Im unable to change the abilities without clogging the screen, if I find a solution I will change that.
- this is primarily a shared compendium, the skill changes that have been implemented are being done as a way to make things easier on dms and players alike.
